divs: Sighting Detailsme and my partner went outside after seeing a very bright object in the sky in south liverpool L1 , we have seen this same object on three other occassions , the last two times we have captured the object on camera we went out on the 11th of may 2012 , at approx 10.00pm to take photos of this object that was in the sky as we moved closer to get a better picture another object appears in the camera shot but not visible to the naked eye , the last time it appeared we also seen other objects in the camera shot but not with the naked eye and in each picture the objects seem to be moving all over the place p.s the camera does not have a flash and was on 2048 by 1536 resolution managed to capture the event and will be looking to see if it returns over the next couple of nights having done some internet searches it appears that there have been a number of different things seen in the liverpool skies if any one else seen this object on friday night leave a comment please
trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Liverpool
There was one other sighting in Liverpool on or around May 11th 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: One object hovering other lights visible in camera shot that appeared and dissapeared
